scripts.init-db: ts-node -e "import { initializeDatabase } from './src/db'; initializeDatabase().then(() => console.log('Database initialized!')).catch(err => console.error('Failed:', err))"
scripts.drop-db: ts-node -e "import { Pool } from 'pg'; const pool = new Pool({user: 'postgres', host: 'localhost', database: 'postgres', password: 'NDKJB-UQJMP-4VL8W-XBLQX-MPCNR', port: 5432}); (async () => {try {await pool.query('DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS clickerdb;'); console.log('Database dropped!'); await pool.query('CREATE DATABASE clickerdb;'); console.log('Empty database created!');} catch (e) {console.error(e);} finally {pool.end();}})();"
scripts.reset-db: npm run drop-db && npm run init-db
